name: Calculus
summary: Deals with the properties of derivatives and integrals of quantities

name: Algebra
summary: Deals with number theory, geometry, and analysis.

name: Geometry
summary: deals with shapes, angles, dimensions and sizes of things

name: Real Analysis
summary: Analyses the behaviour of real numbers, sequences and series, and real functions.

name: Set Theory
summary: Deals with the properties of well-defined collections of objects,

name: Trigonometry
summary: Studies relationships between side lengths and angles of triangles

name: Vector Analysis
summary: Used for understanding the core concepts of electromagnetic field theory.

name: Differential Equation
summary: Relates one or more unknown functions and their derivatives.
